original: Paṭisambhidāmagga
analyzed: paṭisambhidā magga

original: 1 Mahāvagga
analyzed: mahāvagga

original: 1.6. Gatikathā
analyzed: gati kathā

original: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
analyzed: gati sampattiyā ñāṇa sampayutte katinam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇasampayutte katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
analyzed: khattiya mahā sālānam brāhmaṇa mahā sālānam gahapati mahā sālānam kāmāvacarānam devānam ñāṇa sampayutte katinam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Rūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
analyzed: rūpāvacarānam devānam katinam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Arūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ katinaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
analyzed: arūpāvacarānam devānam katinam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
analyzed: gati sampattiyā ñāṇa sampayutte aṭṭhannam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
analyzed: khattiya mahā sālānam brāhmaṇa mahā sālānam gahapati mahā sālānam kāmāvacarānam devānam ñāṇa sampayutte aṭṭhannam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Rūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
analyzed: rūpāvacarānam devānam aṭṭhannam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Arūpāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti.
analyzed: arūpāvacarānam devānam aṭṭhannam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṁ aṭṭhannaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hoti?
analyzed: gati sampattiyā ñāṇa sampayutte katamesam aṭṭhannam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā;
analyzed: kusala kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayaḥ hetū kusalā

original: tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti.
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jāta cetanāya sahajāta paccayāḥ honti

original: Tena vuccati—
analyzed: tena vuccati

original: kusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā.
analyzed: kusala mūla paccayā api saṅkhārā

original: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā;
analyzed: nikanti khaṇe dve hetū akusalā

original: tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti.
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jāta cetanāya sahajāta paccayāḥ honti

original: Tena vuccati—
analyzed: tena vuccati

original: akusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā.
analyzed: akusala mūla paccayā api saṅkhārā

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā;
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe tayaḥ hetū abyākatā

original: tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti.
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jāta cetanāya sahajāta paccayāḥ honti

original: Tena vuccati—
analyzed: tena vuccati

original: “nāmarūpapaccayāpi viññāṇaṁ, viññāṇapaccayāpi nāmarūpaṁ”.
analyzed: nāma rūpa paccayā api viññāṇa viññāṇa paccayā api nāma rūpa

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe pañca kkhandhā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe tayo jīvita saṅkhārā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro khandhā arūpino sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe cattāro khandhāḥ arūpino sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti sampayutta paccayāḥ honti

analyzed: gati sampattiyāḥ ñāṇa vippayutte katamesam channam hetūnam paccayā upapatti hoti

original: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā;
analyzed: kusala kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā

original: tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti.
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jāta cetanāya sahajāta paccayāḥ honti

original: Tena vuccati—
analyzed: tena vuccati

original: “kusalamūlapaccayāpi saṅkhārā”.
analyzed: kusala mūla paccayā api saṅkhārā

original: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā;

original: tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti.
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jāta cetanāya sahajāta paccayāḥ honti

original: tasmiṁ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti.
analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jāta cetanāya sahajāta paccayāḥ honti

original: Tena vuccati—
analyzed: tena vuccati

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe pañcakkhandhā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe pañca kkhandhā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe cattāro mahābhūtā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo jīvitasaṅkhārā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe tayo jīvita saṅkhārā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe nāmañca rūpañca sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe ime cuddasa dhammā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe cattāro khandhāḥ arūpino sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti sampayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cattāri indriyāni sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe cattāri indriyāni sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti sampayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe dve hetū sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti sampayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime dvādasa dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, sampayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe ime dvādasa dhammā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti sampayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ime chabbīsati dhammā sahajātapaccayā honti, aññamaññapaccayā honti, nissayapaccayā honti, vippayuttapaccayā honti.
analyzed: paṭisandhi kkhaṇe ime chabbīsati dhammā sahajāta paccayāḥ honti aññamañña paccayāḥ honti nissaya paccayāḥ honti vippayutta paccayāḥ honti

original: Kusalakammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā;
analyzed: kusala kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā

analyzed: tasmin khaṇe jāta cetanāya sahajāta paccayāḥ honti

original: Tena vuccati—

original: khattiyamahāsālānaṁ brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṁ gahapatimahāsālānaṁ kāmāvacarānaṁ devānaṁ ñāṇavippayutte imesaṁ channaṁ hetūnaṁ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti.
